Text:
After spending the morning and 5 hours of the afternoon in hospital nervously waiting, my Dad is  out of surgery/recovery, and in his room, under sedation.

The most risk was being under anesthesia or bleeding internally during surgery. Now he just has to eat hospital food for 7 to 10 days. (which to be honest is waaay better than his own cooking :)

Life is a lot less bleak right now. The last week has been depression squared. Time to start enjoying LIFE.

Oh, and lets give thanks to Reagan80 for helping me get the show up and seeded the last week on days I was delayed at the hospital.

Pretty good for a Canadian, HAH!
(send us some of that abundant oil, Reagan)

send YOU oil? It ain't free here, bro.

and no thanks needed my brother!

Pleasure to give back after years as a taker.

Annoyme - Thanks and best to your Father and You. I went through it a few years back. Lots of worry. I understand what you mean about the "cooking." Be careful of stoves left 'on.'

Thanks also to Reagan80 - Good work.

All the best.

From the peer list this daily share seems to be serving North & Central & South America, Europe, Australia, Japan and China.

Not bad.

Reagan80 - 
I guess that should have been - "Good work, eh?"

... ;)

Best to you and your Dad!

I know all too well how difficult what you are going through is.

God bless.

Oh!

Thanks again for your efforts and generous sharing!

Especially when you more important things on your mind!  It's really nice that you remember us while having the weight you have on your shoulders!!

We're all sending our prayers and wishes to you!  Hope you feel the "vibe"!!!!
i am probably the only guy down here listening.

Many thanks for your efforts Annoyme, and the best for your father's recovery.
Thank you also Reagan80.

Greetings from Argentina, and yes! you're doing a superb job here.

All the best,
Much appreciated. Good will towards dad.
